title: Can we stop having 86498645148965 "outside of champions kit" damage ?
body:
Jesus fucking Christ man, I do not remember {{champion:56}} ever killing anyone (and I did play him for a while during s4 s5 s6) with only R >  AA with 2 items.

Yeah because that's his only source of damage right ?
{{item:3147}} = 1 more source
{{item:3095}} = 1 more source
{{summoner:14}} = 1 more source
Electrocute = 1 more
Sudden impact = 1 more

Seriously, I'm not playing a FPS, neither do I have the Spidey sense to react so fast to such a burst of someone not even ahead (even a bit behind). Does anyone here have fun by playing this ? There is no counterplay to die in less than a second to any assassin that didn't even use their entire kit and have about 70% of their damage tied to things not even in their base kit.
I'm taking him as an example, but it also goes for AP assassin such as {{champion:7}} (and I admit spamming her), I once managed to "3 shots" 3 squishies during a teamfight with W > R > {{item:3152}}, or just one shot any squishy with Q > R > {{item:3146}}, not even the entire kit being required. This is damn stupid

The original problem of runes was:

B. They couldn't be changed in champ select.

> [{quoted}](name=ZephyrDrake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PXxJEmrW,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2018-08-27T14:35:41.614+0000)

So lets just replace it with this cancerous new system instead of just removing what can't be fixed and fixing what shouldn't need to be removed. How is this system any better? Water Walking isn't used on anyone besides Aurelion Sol, the only runes that matter are the ones that directly increase your damage output, and Electrocute as a keystone has gotten so bad that its become the standard to use it on champions it wasn't meant for (Hello TLD meta). 

The runes in the old system were there purely for early game stat optimization. Maokai took attack speed runes because his AA animation was ass and needed the extra AS to last hit well. Hecarim took movement speed runes because it helped him get through jungle faster while also increasing his AD thanks to his passive. Mages took Mpen marks because wave clear and better trading in lane. It made SENSE back then, even if many parts of the system went unused. Every champion had a specific setup for early game with runes. I haven't play a single tank that doesn't go bone plating ever since it came out.

Balance can be fixed though.  Exciting is the hard part.  Once exciting is made, the numbers can later be tweaked.

Theoretically, anyways.  Numbers have not been tweaked very much lately.

Karthus starts in Sorcery and takes those runes anyway.  But the reason you go Precision is for the cooldown on ult.  His ult is 200/180/160 seconds, so 10% off that for a kill or assist is massive.

Additionally, Karthus can either go Goup de Grace to help ensure his ult kills, or he can go Last Stand so that when he's in his passive, he does even more damage.  So instead of doing 7% more only to low health enemies, he can do 11% more damage to everyone because he's below the health threshold in his passive.
